markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Cleric Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5067) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 217 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Cleric](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=212)

**Prerequisites**
[Cleric Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=5066)

</column>

---

You gain the basic [spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=2132).. You can prepare your deity’s spells in your spell slots of the appropriate rank from the cleric archetype.

<title level="2">Basic Cleric Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Divine Breadth](/Feats.aspx?ID=5070), [Expert Cleric Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5071)
name: Basic Cleric Spellcasting
